Name: George Coles Bursary
Keywords: first time first year student residents of Prince Edward Island, do not have any previous post-secondary education

Name: Island Student Award
Keywords: Eligible Island students registered in a full-time program in both semesters at UPEI or Maritime Christian College will receive an Island Student Award in their second, third and fourth year of study

Name: Island Skills Award
Keywords: Eligible Island students registered in a full-time program for 24 continuous weeks at Holland College or Collège Acadie Î.-P.-É. will receive a $1,000 Island Skills Award in their first and second year of study.

Name: Community Service Bursary
Keywords: offer Island students in Grades 11 and 12, who plan to attend any post-secondary institution, a bursary in recognition of volunteer work performed in their communities

Name: George Coles Graduate Scholarship
Keywords: The George Coles Graduate Scholarship is a scholarship for Island residents graduating from UPEI or Maritime Christian College in their first undergraduate degree

Name: Medical Residency Interest Relief Program
Keywords: The Government of Prince Edward Island has established a Medical Residency Interest Relief Program which provides financial assistance to students completing a residency program

Name: Marine Atlantic Bursary
Keywords: Marine Atlantic Bursary is to provide on-going recognition of the service provided by the employees of Marine Atlantic
